required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sexual Timing in Couples Actively Trying to Conceive
clinical_study.official_title: What is the Best Sexual Intercourse Strategy for Couples Actively Trying to Conceive?

collaborator.agency: Fundação para a Ciência e a Tecnologia

brief_summary.textblock: This study will asses the effectiveness of two strategies for timed intercourse in couples actively trying to conceive

primary_outcome.measure: Change in sexual functioning over the course of one year
primary_outcome.time_frame: T0 - before the intervention; T1 - one month later; T2 - six months later; T3 - one year later]
primary_outcome.description: Self-report measure (FSFI, Rosen et al., 2000; IIEF, Rosen et al., 1997)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Depression over the course of one year
secondary_outcome.time_frame: T0 - before the intervention; T1 - one month later; T2 - six months later; T3 - one year later]

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Anxiety over the course of one year
secondary_outcome.time_frame: T0 - before the intervention; T1 - one month later; T2 - six months later; T3 - one year later]

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants that attain an infertility diagnosis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: T0 - before the intervention; T1 - one month later; T2 - six months later; T3 - one year later]

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants that achieve conception
secondary_outcome.time_frame: T0 - before the intervention; T1 - one month later; T2 - six months later; T3 - one year later]

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in social support over the course of one year
secondary_outcome.time_frame: T0 - before the intervention; T1 - one month later; T2 - six months later; T3 - one year later]

arm_group.description: participants will visualize educational video with timed intercourse as recommended by NICE and ASRM
participants will visualize educational video with timed intercourse as recommended by well-know evidence of better conception rates when using this strategy
participants will respond to questionnaire with no knowledge of intervention

criteria.textblock:
Note: age limits are for female age only
Inclusion Criteria:
- Childless couples trying to conceive
- Relationship length > one year
Exclusion Criteria:
- Couples that already had achieved a successful pregnancy
- Couples with children

facility.name: University of Porto, Faculty of Psychology and Educational and Education Sciences
